Merge branch 'develop' of gitlab.abinit.org:trunk/abinit into eph

Fred forces were not correctly output during MD/relaxation They were not synchronized with fcart Ex.: if Faverage was suppressed from fcart  it wa not from red. This is now corrected. However the value of dE/dt remains unchanged in out file (not equal to -Fred). This is logical as it is supposed to be the exact derivative of the energy.
